Game.Name: Youkai Douchuuki (Japan)
Game.plot: Shadow Land is an Action game, developed by TOSE and published by Namco,which was released in Japan in 1988.Cheat: Secret Password ScreenAt the title screen enter the code to access the password screen.The following passwords can be used:Cheat: Secret Password ScreenPC-ENGINE (message)NAMCO (message)NAMCOT (message)6502 (message)6809 (message)68000 (message)756-2311 (message)YAMASHITA (message)AKIRA (message)KOMAI (message)KAZUHIKO (message)KAWADA (message)SPEED-UP (4 way split screen) reset after entering the password S.62.08.22 (Start from level 5) reset after entering the passwordCheat: Secret Password ScreenCheat: Unlock The EndingsThere are 5 possible endings in this game. Finish the last stage with the following Score/Money Points and you'll get one of five endings. The enemies killed also have something to do with the endings you get, so try to kill as few enemies as you can.
Game.Notes: Tarosuke has died and now must cross the purgatory as depicted in Buddhist lore, fighting enemies and advancing in his path towards ultimate redemption. Depending on just how well he behaves in this afterlife you can see up to 5 different endings, which involve everything from re-incarnation to eternal damnation in hell. Yōkai Dōchūki plays as a side-scrolling action platformer, in which you control Tarosuke as he jumps around the game world, avoiding pitfalls and other traps. Enemies can be defeated by the use of a ki-based projectile attack and, once defeated, monsters leave behind money which can be exchanged in-game for health and other unique power-ups. Bosses are based on several Buddhist tales; being much too powerful for Tarosuke, he must invoke his guardian spirit to defeat such demons, which involves finding a shrine and praying until it is summoned.
